Hunger of Hadar is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Hunger of Hadar is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Hunger of Hadar Information

Description: Creatures within this black sphere are Blinded and take damage at the end of their turn and the start of their turn. Creatures starting their turn in the area take 2~12 Cold damage. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take 2~12 Acid damage. The area is Difficult Terrain. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m 6m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: DEX Save

How to Acquire Hunger of Hadar

Hunger of Hadar can be acquired by the following classes: Warlock Bard (Magical Secrets) at Level 6 (Lore) or 10 Hunger of Hadar can be cast by using the following Items: Markoheshkir

Warlock Bard (Magical Secrets) at Level 6 (Lore) or 10

Hunger of Hadar Tips & Notes

Attack rolls on blinded enemies have advantage. But the advantage from attacking blinded enemies inside Hunger of Hadar actually gets neutralized by the disadvantage from attacking into darkness. To fully utilize the blind granted by Hunger of Hadar, some form of darkvision is recommended. That way, all attack rolls targeting the enemies inside will retain advantage. Eversight Ring negates the Blind effect
